channel.title: Home
channel.description: A virtual proof that I'm awesome

item.title: Flexbuffers on Kotlin Multiplatform Part I
item.description: A blazing fast schemaless data-interchange format for Kotlin Multiplatform - The objective of the post is to collect some notes about the implementation details and usage of Flexbuffers using Kotlin Multiplatform, and reason about where FlexBuffers can be a good replacement for our good old schemaless champion JSON. Since I’ve written the Java’s port as well, it will be a...

item.title: Pinelang, hello world!
item.description: A script language on top of Kotlin - So I decided to resurrect an old project of mine to create a small footprint scripting language on top of Kotlin. But why would one do that? HttpServer { hostname: 'localhost' port: 8080 on connection: (resp) { println("Hello world:" + resp.text) } } What is Pinelang? PineLang is a minimalistic,...
